info.name: Google Bar Colorizer
info.description: Change Google Bar background color with your chosen color.
info.additionalInfo:
Compatibility:
- Firefox 3.6 and latest
- Chrome 10 and latest


Related styles:
* style 50447 by me
* style 50749 by user 109118
* style 50743 by user 109087
* style 50612 by user 108788
* style 50535 by user 177

options.label: outset gradient
options.value:
background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, .5), transparent) !important;
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(bottom, rgba(0, 0, 0, .5), transparent) !important;

options.label: inset gradient
options.value:
background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0, 0, 0, .5), transparent) !important;
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, rgba(0, 0, 0, .5), transparent) !important;
